mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO visitor_log( session_id, user_id, ip_address, user_agent, page_url, referer, visited_at ) VALUES ( #{sessionId}, #{userId}, #{ipAddress}, #{userAgent}, #{pageUrl}, #{referer}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT session_id) FROM visitor_log WHERE DATE(visited_at) = CURDATE()
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM visitor_log WHERE session_id = #{sessionId} AND DATE(visited_at) = CURDATE() LIMIT 1

SELECT vl.log_id, vl.session_id, vl.user_id, CONCAT(COALESCE(up.first_name, ''), ' ', COALESCE(up.last_name, '')) AS user_name, u.email AS user_email, vl.ip_address, vl.user_agent, vl.page_url, vl.referer, vl.visited_at FROM ( SELECT session_id, MAX(log_id) AS latest_log_id FROM visitor_log WHERE DATE(visited_at) = CURDATE() GROUP BY session_id ) AS latest_visits JOIN visitor_log vl ON latest_visits.latest_log_id = vl.log_id LEFT JOIN users u ON vl.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN user_profile up ON u.user_id = up.user_id ORDER BY vl.visited_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
